title: "Setup: How to setup and run the tutorial"
---

## Download notebooks

Download notebooks from the right sidebar.
Select `Colab` if you are using [Google Colab](#google-colab).

## Computational environments

### JupyterHub at UHH

1. Open <https://code.min.uni-hamburg.de/>
1. Select `File` > `New Launcher`
1. At the bottom, select `Terminal`
1. In the Terminal, enter:

    ```bash
    git clone {{< var project.source >}}
    cd {{< var project.name >}}
    make install
    ```

1. From the sidebar on the left, you can now open the tutorial notebook in the `{{< var project.name >}}` folder:

    - `tutorial.ipynb`

1. Paste the installation command into the first cell of the notebook:

    ```bash
    source .venv/bin/activate
    ```
